target.DEFAULT: https://The ontology was first developed under the OntoDM (Ontology of Data Mining is available at http://kt.ijs.si/panovp/OntoDM) ontology, but for generality and reuse purpose it was decided to export it as a separate ontology. Additionaly, the OntoDT ontology is based on and ISO/IEC 11404 (http://www.iso.org/iso/catalogue_detail.htm?csnumber=39479) standard and can be reused used independently by any domain ontology that requires representation and reasoning about general purpose datatypes.

redirect: https://The ontology was first developed under the OntoDM (Ontology of Data Mining is available at http://kt.ijs.si/panovp/OntoDM) ontology, but for generality and reuse purpose it was decided to export it as a separate ontology. Additionaly, the OntoDT ontology is based on and ISO/IEC 11404 (http://www.iso.org/iso/catalogue_detail.htm?csnumber=39479) standard and can be reused used independently by any domain ontology that requires representation and reasoning about general purpose datatypes.
